original_text: Moses wrote the words of the old agreement on pieces of stone. It showed how great and powerful God was. Moses' face shone brightly after God spoke to him. It did not stay bright, but the Israelite people still could not look at Moses' face. The old agreement that brought death was powerful.
korean_text: 돌에 써서 새긴 죽게 하는 율법 조문의 직분도 영광이 있어 이스라엘 자손들은 모세의 얼굴의 없어질 영광 때문에도 그 얼굴을 주목하지 못하였거든

sentences.original_text: Moses wrote the words of the old agreement
It showed how great and powerful God was
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님이 얼마나 위대하고 강력한지를 보여주었다

sentences.original_text: but the Israelite people still could not look
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이스라엘 백성은 여전히 볼 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: The old agreement that brought death
